  # 3CX MCP Server for BrainSAIT LINC                                                       
                                                                                            
  ## Goal                                                                                   
  Build an MCP server that connects 3CX Cloud PBX (https://1593.3cx.cloud, ext 12310,       
  Twilio SIP trunk) to MCP clients (Claude Desktop/Code) and BrainSAIT LINC agents for      
  calling and messaging.

  MCP Clients (Claude Desktop/Code)

  ## MCP Tools (10 tools)                                                                   
                                                                                            
  | Tool | Description | Key Params |                                                       
  |------|-------------|------------|                                                       
  | `make_call` | Initiate outbound call | extension, destination |                         
  | `answer_call` | Answer incoming call | extension, participant_id |                      
  | `transfer_call` | Blind/attended transfer | extension, participant_id, destination,     
  type |                                                                                    
  | `hold_call` | Hold or resume | extension, participant_id, action |                      
  | `drop_call` | Hang up call | extension, participant_id |                                
  | `send_message` | SMS/WhatsApp/chat | from_extension, to, message, channel |             
  | `get_call_logs` | CDR query | extension?, direction?, start_date?, limit? |             
  | `get_extensions` | List extensions | department?, include_status? |                     
  | `get_presence` | Extension status | extension |                                         
  | `record_call` | Start/stop recording | extension, participant_id, action |              
                                                                                            
  ## MCP Resources (4 resources)                                                            
                                                                                            
  | URI | Description |                                                                     
  |-----|-------------|                                                                     
  | `3cx://active-calls` | Real-time active calls |                                         
  | `3cx://call-history` | CDR records |                                                    
  | `3cx://extensions` | Extension directory + presence |                                   
  | `3cx://messages` | SMS/chat history |

  ## Implementation Steps                                                                   
                                                                                            
  ### Step 1: Package scaffold                                                              
  - `package.json` with `@modelcontextprotocol/sdk`, `zod`, `ws`, `dotenv`                  
  - `tsconfig.json` targeting ES2022/NodeNext                                               
  - `.env` with 3CX credentials                                                             
                                                                                            
  ### Step 2: Auth + API clients                                                            
  - `token-manager.ts` ‚Äî OAuth2 password grant with auto-refresh (email/password auth)      
  - `call-control.ts` ‚Äî HTTP client for call operations                                     
  - `xapi.ts` ‚Äî OData client for config/CDR                                                 
                                                                                            
  ### Step 3: MCP tools                                                                     
  - Register all 10 tools with Zod input schemas                                            
  - Each tool calls the appropriate API client method                                       
  - Return structured content blocks                                                        
                                                                                            
  ### Step 4: MCP resources                                                                 
  - Static resources (extensions) + dynamic (active calls)                                  
  - Resources read from 3CX APIs on demand                                                  
                                                                                            
  ### Step 5: WebSocket events                                                              
  - `websocket.ts` ‚Äî persistent WSS connection to 3CX                                       
  - Event dispatch for call state changes                                                   
  - Resource subscription notifications                                                     
                                                                                            
  ### Step 6: Basma AI bridge                                                               
  - Audio stream from 3CX (PCM 16-bit 8kHz) ‚Üí Whisper STT                                   
  - Claude AI processes conversation ‚Üí TTS response                                         
  - Stream audio back to 3CX participant                                                    
  - Reuses `@basma/shared` ai-service and speech utilities                                  
                                                                                            
  ### Step 7: MasterLinc bridge                                                             
  - Forward call events to MasterLinc `/api/v1/coordinate`                                  
  - Route to appropriate LINC agent based on caller/context                                 
  - Execute agent response actions via Call Control API                                     
                                                                                            
  ### Step 8: Configure MCP client                                                          
  - Add to Claude Desktop `claude_desktop_config.json`                                      
  - Add to Claude Code `.claude.json` mcpServers

English Version
In the scorching heat of West Darfur, names travel faster than
the wind across the dry, cracked bed of Wadi Kaga.

Most of our colleagues fled when the national service postings
were announced. They saw the "killing zones" of Dar Andoka as a
death sentence. I saw them as a mirror. I have always craved the
taste of new experiences‚Äînot out of a desire for danger, but
because I believe the soul only reveals its true architecture at
its jagged edges. I went to Al Geneina without hesitation,
seeking a version of myself I hadn't yet met.

While I was stationed there, the soldiers spoke of a ghost. They
spoke of a doctor assigned to the "Movable Convoy"‚Äîthe high-risk
medical unit that followed the front lines. They told stories of
a man who once performed a vascular repair on a dying soldier in
the back of a bouncing Land Cruiser during a midnight ambush,
holding the artery closed with his bare fingers while RPGs lit
up the sky. In my mind, I built a monument to this Dr. Mohamed
Hajo. I pictured a giant of a man, a titan with iron shoulders
and a voice that could drown out the sound of shelling.

The war eventually receded into memory, and we returned to the
mundane world of Khartoum's bureaucracy to receive our back-pay.
The salary office smelled of stale paper, cigarette smoke, and
the exhaustion of men who had traded their courage for a place
in a line. It was a sharp, pathetic contrast to the smell of
Darfur‚Äîthe scent of dry grass, woodsmoke, and the metallic tang
of blood on dust.

Standing in that weary line, a name was shouted: "Hajo! Dr.
Mohamed Hajo!"

I stood on my toes, expecting the titan to emerge. Instead, a
slim, small, skinny man raised a hesitant hand. He looked
fragile, his frame so slight that a strong gust from the Sahara
might have carried him away. A philosophical shock struck me: Is
this the man the army worships? Is this the hero of the convoy?

My curiosity was a fire. I stepped toward him as he stepped away
from the desk. "Al-salamu alaykum. Are you Dr. Hajo?" "Yes," he
replied. His voice was not thunder; it was a calm, steady
stream. "Did you go to Darfur?" "I did." "Were you..." I paused,
looking for the secret password of our shared hell. "Were you
assigned to the Movable Convoy?"

He stopped. He looked at me then, and the fragility vanished.
His eyes held the reflection of the same sun and the same blood
I had seen. He knew that only someone who had stood on that same
jagged edge would ask about the convoy. "And are you," he asked
softly, "Dr. Mohamed Al-Fadil?"

In that moment, the sterile office disappeared. The physical
world‚Äîhis smallness, my weariness‚Äîmeant nothing. We were no
longer strangers; we were brothers forged in a fire that the
people in this line could never perceive. Since that day, we
have been inseparable‚Äîfriends, colleagues, and the only two
people who know that a man's true height is measured by the
weight of the spirit he carries.

<style>
    * {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    :root {
        --bg-primary: #0a0e1a;
        --bg-secondary: #0f1419;
        --accent-purple: #a78bfa;
        --accent-blue: #60a5fa;
        --accent-cyan: #22d3ee;
        --accent-pink: #f472b6;
        --accent-orange: #fb923c;
        --accent-green: #4ade80;
        --text-primary: #f8fafc;
        --text-secondary: #94a3b8;
        --glass-bg: rgba(15, 20, 25, 0.4);
        --glass-border: rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.1);
    }

    body {
        font-family: 'Inter', 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic', system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;
        background: var(--bg-primary);
        color: var(--text-primary);
        overflow: hidden;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    }

    /* Animated mesh gradient background */
    .mesh-bg {
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        z-index: 0;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0e1a 0%, #1a1f2e 50%, #0f1419 100%);
    }

    .mesh-gradient {
        position: absolute;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        opacity: 0.6;
        filter: blur(80px);
    }

    .gradient-sphere {
        position: absolute;
        border-radius: 50%;
        animation: float 20s infinite ease-in-out;
    }

    .sphere-1 {
        width: 500px;
        height: 500px;
        background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.4), transparent);
        top: -10%;
        left: -10%;
        animation-delay: 0s;
    }

    .sphere-2 {
        width: 600px;
        height: 600px;
        background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.3), transparent);
        bottom: -15%;
        right: -10%;
        animation-delay: -7s;
    }

    .sphere-3 {
        width: 450px;
        height: 450px;
        background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.35), transparent);
        top: 40%;
        left: 50%;
        animation-delay: -14s;
    }

    .sphere-4 {
        width: 550px;
        height: 550px;
        background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(244, 114, 182, 0.25), transparent);
        top: 10%;
        right: 20%;
        animation-delay: -3.5s;
    }

    @keyframes float {
        0%, 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) scale(1); }
        33% { transform: translate(40px, -40px) scale(1.1); }
        66% { transform: translate(-30px, 30px) scale(0.9); }
    }

    .noise {
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        pointer-events: none;
        opacity: 0.02;
        z-index: 1;
        background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noise'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.9' numOctaves='4'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noise)'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
    }

    /* Glass morphism */
    .glass {
        background: var(--glass-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
        box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    }

    .glass-strong {
        background: rgba(15, 20, 25, 0.7);
        backdrop-filter: blur(30px) saturate(150%);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(30px) saturate(150%);
        border: 1px solid rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.2);
        box-shadow: 
            0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4),
            inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
    }

    /* Layout */
    .app-grid {
        position: relative;
        z-index: 2;
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 300px 1fr 340px;
        grid-template-rows: auto 1fr;
        gap: 1.25rem;
        padding: 1.25rem;
        height: 100vh;
        max-width: 2400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    /* Top bar */
    .top-bar {
        grid-column: 1 / -1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
        border-radius: 24px;
    }

    .brand {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
    }

    .brand-logo {
        width: 48px;
        height: 48px;
        border-radius: 16px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a78bfa, #60a5fa);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: white;
    }

    .brand-text h1 {
        font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a78bfa, #60a5fa, #22d3ee);
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        background-clip: text;
        letter-spacing: -0.02em;
    }

    .brand-subtitle {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--text-secondary);
        margin-top: 0.125rem;
    }

    .top-controls {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .api-status {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
        background: rgba(74, 222, 128, 0.1);
        border: 1px solid rgba(74, 222, 128, 0.2);
        border-radius: 16px;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        font-weight: 500;
    }

    .status-dot {
        width: 8px;
        height: 8px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #4ade80;
        animation: pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite;
    }

    @keyframes pulse {
        0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
        50% { opacity: 0.5; }
    }

    .lang-toggle {
        display: flex;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
        border-radius: 12px;
        padding: 0.25rem;
    }

    .lang-btn {
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        color: var(--text-secondary);
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        border-radius: 8px;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.2s;
    }

    .lang-btn.active {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a78bfa, #60a5fa);
        color: white;
    }

    /* Sidebar */
    .sidebar {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;
        overflow-y: auto;
        padding-right: 0.5rem;
    }

    .domain-card {
        padding: 1.5rem;
        border-radius: 20px;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
        border: 1px solid transparent;
    }

    .domain-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-4px);
        border-color: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.3);
        background: rgba(15, 20, 25, 0.8);
    }

    .domain-card.active {
        background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.1);
        border-color: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.4);
    }

    .domain-icon {
        width: 56px;
        height: 56px;
        border-radius: 16px;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 2rem;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
    }

    .domain-title {
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        color: var(--text-primary);
    }

    .domain-desc {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--text-secondary);
        line-height: 1.5;
    }

    .domain-count {
        display: inline-block;
        margin-top: 0.75rem;
        padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem;
        background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.15);
        border-radius: 8px;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--accent-purple);
    }

    /* Chat area */
    .chat-main {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;
    }

    .chat-header {
        padding: 2rem;
        border-radius: 24px;
    }

    .chat-header h2 {
        font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
        font-size: 2.25rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--text-primary), var(--text-secondary));
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }

    .chat-header p {
        color: var(--text-secondary);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
    }

    .messages {
        flex: 1;
        overflow-y: auto;
        padding: 2rem;
        border-radius: 24px;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 2rem;
    }

    .message {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.25rem;
        animation: slideUp 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    }

    @keyframes slideUp {
        from {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(20px);
        }
        to {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
    }

    .msg-avatar {
        width: 48px;
        height: 48px;
        border-radius: 14px;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 1rem;
        flex-shrink: 0;
    }

    .msg-avatar.assistant {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a78bfa, #60a5fa);
    }

    .msg-avatar.user {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fb923c, #f472b6);
    }

    .msg-content {
        flex: 1;
    }

    .msg-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
    }

    .msg-name {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
    }

    .msg-time {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--text-secondary);
    }

    .msg-badge {
        padding: 0.25rem 0.625rem;
        background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.15);
        border-radius: 6px;
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--accent-purple);
    }

    .msg-text {
        line-height: 1.7;
        color: rgba(248, 250, 252, 0.9);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
    }

    .msg-text p {
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
    }

    .msg-text strong {
        color: var(--text-primary);
        font-weight: 600;
    }

    .msg-text code {
        background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.1);
        padding: 0.125rem 0.5rem;
        border-radius: 6px;
        font-family: 'Monaco', 'Courier New', monospace;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
    }

    .msg-text ul, .msg-text ol {
        margin: 1rem 0 1rem 1.5rem;
    }

    .msg-text li {
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    }

    .message.user .msg-content {
        background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.08);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        border-radius: 16px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.15);
    }

    .typing {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
        border-radius: 16px;
        width: fit-content;
    }

    .typing-dot {
        width: 8px;
        height: 8px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--accent-purple);
        animation: bounce 1.4s infinite;
    }

    .typing-dot:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
    .typing-dot:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

    @keyframes bounce {
        0%, 60%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
        30% { transform: translateY(-10px); }
    }

    /* Input */
    .input-area {
        padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
        border-radius: 24px;
    }

    .input-wrapper {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: flex-end;
    }

    .input-field {
        flex: 1;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
        border: 1px solid rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.1);
        border-radius: 18px;
        padding: 1.125rem 1.5rem;
        color: var(--text-primary);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
        font-family: inherit;
        resize: none;
        min-height: 60px;
        max-height: 200px;
        transition: all 0.2s;
    }

    .input-field:focus {
        outline: none;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
        border-color: var(--accent-purple);
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.1);
    }

    .input-field::placeholder {
        color: var(--text-secondary);
    }

    .send-btn {
        width: 60px;
        height: 60px;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 18px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a78bfa, #60a5fa);
        color: white;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        transition: all 0.2s;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 14px rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.4);
    }

    .send-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
        transform: translateY(-2px);
        box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.5);
    }

    .send-btn:disabled {
        opacity: 0.5;
        cursor: not-allowed;
    }

    /* Right panel */
    .right-panel {
        display: flex;

    /* RTL */

        font-family: 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic', 'Inter', sans-serif;

    [dir="rtl"] .quick-action:hover {

                { icon: 'üî¨', title: 'Diagnostic Help', desc: 'Image analysis', prompt: 'Help me interpret diagnostic imaging results' },

            ],

                { icon: 'üí°', title: 'Strategy Session', desc: 'Growth planning', prompt: 'Help me develop a strategic growth plan for Q2 2026' },

            ],

        suggestedPrompts: {
            healthcare: [
                'Interpret abnormal CBC lab results',
                'Analyze drug-drug interactions',
                'Create clinical documentation template',
                'Review diabetes treatment protocol'
            ],
            business: [
                'SWOT analysis for market entry',

                'Pricing strategy optimization'
            ],

                'Refactor this Python function',
                'Explain OAuth 2.0 implementation',

            ],

        },

        init() {
            this.bindEvents();
            this.renderWelcome();
            this.updateUI();
        },

        bindEvents() {
            // Domain switching
            document.querySelectorAll('.domain-card').forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    const domain = e.currentTarget.dataset.domain;
                    this.switchDomain(domain);
                });
            });

            // Language toggle
            document.querySelectorAll('.lang-btn').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    this.switchLang(e.target.dataset.lang);
                });
            });

            // Send message
            const input = document.getElementById('message-input');
            const sendBtn = document.getElementById('send-button');

            input.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
                if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.sendMessage();
                }
            });

            input.addEventListener('input', () => this.autoResize());

            sendBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.sendMessage());
        },

        switchDomain(domain) {
            this.state.domain = domain;

            // Update active card
            document.querySelectorAll('.domain-card').forEach(card => {
                card.classList.toggle('active', card.dataset.domain === domain);
            });

            this.updateUI();

            const config = this.domains[domain];
            this.addMessage('assistant', 
                `Switched to **${config.title.en}**. ${config.agent} is ready to assist you.`, 
                config.agent
            );
        },

        switchLang(lang) {
            this.state.lang = lang;
            document.documentElement.setAttribute('lang', lang);
            document.documentElement.setAttribute('dir', lang === 'ar' ? 'rtl' : 'ltr');

            document.querySelectorAll('.lang-btn').forEach(btn => {
                btn.classList.toggle('active', btn.dataset.lang === lang);
            });

            this.updateUI();
        },

        updateUI() {
            const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
            const lang = this.state.lang;

            document.getElementById('domain-title').textContent = config.title[lang];
            document.getElementById('domain-subtitle').textContent = config.subtitle[lang];
            document.getElementById('agent-name').textContent = config.agent;
            document.getElementById('agent-desc').textContent = config.desc[lang];

            this.renderQuickActions();
            this.renderPrompts();
        },

        renderQuickActions() {
            const container = document.getElementById('quick-actions-container');
            const actions = this.quickActions[this.state.domain];

            container.innerHTML = actions.map(a => `
                <div class="quick-action" onclick="APP.useAction('${a.prompt.replace(/'/g, "\\'")}')">
                    <div class="qa-icon">${a.icon}</div>
                    <div class="qa-title">${a.title}</div>
                    <div class="qa-desc">${a.desc}</div>
                </div>
            `).join('');
        },

        renderPrompts() {
            const container = document.getElementById('prompts-container');
            const prompts = this.suggestedPrompts[this.state.domain];

            container.innerHTML = prompts.map(p => `
                <div class="prompt-chip" onclick="APP.fillPrompt('${p.replace(/'/g, "\\'")}')">
                    ${p}
                </div>
            `).join('');
        },

        useAction(prompt) {
            document.getElementById('message-input').value = prompt;
            this.sendMessage();
        },

        fillPrompt(prompt) {
            document.getElementById('message-input').value = prompt;
            document.getElementById('message-input').focus();
        },

        renderWelcome() {
            const msg = `Welcome to **MASTERLINC**, your universal AI intelligence platform. I orchestrate specialized agents across four domains:

üè• Healthcare & Medical - Clinical support, claims, diagnostics, compliance
üìä Business & Operations - Strategy, finance, marketing, operations
üíª Development & Tech - Full-stack coding, architecture, DevOps, AI/ML
üéØ Personal Growth - Learning, productivity, wellness, creativity

How can I assist you today?`;

            this.addMessage('assistant', msg, 'MASTERLINC');
        },

        async sendMessage() {
            if (this.state.processing) return;

            const input = document.getElementById('message-input');
            const msg = input.value.trim();
            
            if (!msg) return;

            this.addMessage('user', msg);
            input.value = '';
            this.autoResize();

            this.showTyping();
            this.state.processing = true;

            try {
                const response = await this.callClaude(msg);
                this.hideTyping();
                
                const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
                this.addMessage('assistant', response, config.agent);
            } catch (error) {
                this.hideTyping();
                this.addMessage('assistant', `‚ö†Ô∏è Error: ${error.message}`, 'System');
            } finally {
                this.state.processing = false;
            }
        },

        async callClaude(userMessage) {
            const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
            
            const systemPrompt = `You are ${config.agent}, a specialized AI assistant for ${config.title.en}.

${config.desc.en}

Guidelines:

Provide expert, actionable guidance
Use domain-specific terminology appropriately
Be concise but comprehensive
Include examples when helpful
Format with markdown for clarity
If query suits another domain better, mention it
Language: ${this.state.lang === ‚Äòen‚Äô ? ‚ÄòEnglish‚Äô : ‚ÄòArabic‚Äô}`;

            try {
                // AGENT: Call Anthropic API
                const response = await fetch('https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                        'anthropic-version': '2023-06-01'
                        // API key handled by browser extension or proxy
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        model: 'claude-sonnet-4-20250514',
                        max_tokens: 2048,
                        system: systemPrompt,
                        messages: [{
                            role: 'user',
                            content: userMessage
                        }]
                    })
                });

                if (!response.ok) {
                    throw new Error(`API error: ${response.status}`);
                }

                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.content?.[0]?.text) {
                    return data.content[0].text;
                }
                
                throw new Error('Invalid API response');
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Claude API error:', error);
                
                // Intelligent fallback
                return this.fallbackResponse(userMessage);
            }
        },

        fallbackResponse(userMessage) {
            const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
            
            return `I'm ${config.agent}, ready to help with "${userMessage}"

Note: This is a fallback response. To enable real-time Claude AI:

Add your Anthropic API key via browser extension
Use a proxy service with API key
Deploy with server-side API integration
${config.agent} specializes in:
${config.desc.en}

Would you like me to help you get started with any specific task in this domain?`;
},

        addMessage(type, text, sender = '') {
            const container = document.getElementById('messages-container');
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.className = `message ${type}`;

            const time = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(this.state.lang === 'ar' ? 'ar-SA' : 'en-US', {
                hour: '2-digit',
                minute: '2-digit'
            });

            const avatar = type === 'assistant' ? (sender?.substring(0, 2) || 'ML') : 'You';
            const badge = type === 'assistant' && sender ? `<span class="msg-badge">${sender}</span>` : '';

            div.innerHTML = `
                <div class="msg-avatar ${type}">${avatar}</div>
                <div class="msg-content">
                    <div class="msg-header">
                        <span class="msg-name">${sender || (type === 'user' ? 'You' : 'Assistant')}</span>
                        ${badge}
                        <span class="msg-time">${time}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="msg-text">${this.formatText(text)}</div>
                </div>
            `;

            container.appendChild(div);
            container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
        },

        formatText(text) {
            return text
                .replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/g, '<strong>$1</strong>')
                .replace(/\*(.*?)\*/g, '<em>$1</em>')
                .replace(/`(.*?)`/g, '<code>$1</code>')
                .replace(/\n/g, '<br>');
        },

        showTyping() {
            const container = document.getElementById('messages-container');
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.id = 'typing-indicator';
            div.className = 'message assistant';
            div.innerHTML = `
                <div class="msg-avatar assistant">ML</div>
                <div class="typing">
                    <span class="typing-dot"></span>
                    <span class="typing-dot"></span>
                    <span class="typing-dot"></span>
                </div>
            `;
            container.appendChild(div);
            container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
        },

        hideTyping() {

        }
    };

    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => APP.init());

    // Parallax effect
    document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
        const x = (e.clientX / window.innerWidth - 0.5) * 30;
        const y = (e.clientY / window.innerHeight - 0.5) * 30;
        
        document.querySelectorAll('.gradient-sphere').forEach((sphere, i) => {
            const speed = (i + 1) * 0.3;
            sphere.style.transform = `translate(${x * speed}px, ${y * speed}px)`;
        });
    });

import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
 
export const generateToken = (payload, expiresIn = process.env.JWT_EXPIRES_IN) => {
  return jwt.sign(payload, process.env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn });
};
 
export const generateRefreshToken = (payload) => {
  return jwt.sign(payload, process.env.JWT_REFRESH_SECRET, {
    expiresIn: process.env.JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN,
  });
};
 
export const verifyToken = (token) => {
  try {
    return jwt.verify(token, process.env.JWT_SECRET);
  } catch (error) {
    throw new Error('Invalid token');
  }
};

Express 5.x Compatibility

Route matching behavior may have changed

‚úÖ Fix Complete! 405 Method Not Allowed Error Resolved
I've successfully implemented all the fixes to resolve the 405 Method Not Allowed error on the claim submission endpoint. Here's what was fixed:

üîß Changes Made
1. Fixed Rate Limiter Path (server.js:47)
Before: app.use('/api/', limiter)
After: app.use('/api', limiter)
Why: The trailing slash was causing Express to not match /api/submit-claim correctly
2. Enhanced CORS Configuration (server.js:50-58)
Added explicit allowed methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
Added explicit allowed headers for content types
Added dedicated OPTIONS handler for preflight requests
Why: Multipart form-data requests need proper CORS preflight handling
3. Relaxed Helmet CSP (server.js:25-40)
Added "form-action": ["'self'"] directive
Disabled crossOriginEmbedderPolicy
Why: Helmet was blocking form submissions due to overly restrictive security policy
4. Enhanced Error Handling (server.js:412-448)
All errors now return JSON instead of HTML
Added 404 handler for API routes
Better error messages with request context
Why: The "Unexpected token '<'" error was caused by HTML error pages being returned instead of JSON
5. Added Debug Logging (server.js:64-71, 130-134)
Logs all incoming requests with method, path, and headers
Logs claim submission attempts with file info
Why: Makes debugging much easier and tracks request flow
6. Created Test Script (test-submit-claim.js)
Tests OPTIONS preflight requests
Tests POST without file
Tests POST with file upload
Why: Easy way to verify the fix works

            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a78bfa, #60a5fa);
            color: white;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            transition: all 0.2s;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 14px rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.4);
        }

        .send-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.5);
        }

        .send-btn:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
        }

        /* Right panel */
        .right-panel {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 1rem;
            overflow-y: auto;
        }

        .panel-card {
            padding: 1.75rem;
            border-radius: 20px;
        }

        .panel-title {
            font-size: 0.9375rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.625rem;
        }

        .quick-action {
            padding: 1.125rem;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
            border: 1px solid rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.08);
            border-radius: 14px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }

        .quick-action:hover {
            background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.1);
            border-color: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.3);
            transform: translateX(4px);
        }

        .qa-icon {
            font-size: 1.75rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.625rem;
        }

        .qa-title {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        }

        .qa-desc {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.5;
        }

        .prompt-chip {
            padding: 0.875rem 1.125rem;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
            border: 1px solid rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.08);
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8125rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
            margin-bottom: 0.625rem;
            display: block;
            text-align: left;
        }

        .prompt-chip:hover {
            background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.1);
            border-color: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.3);
        }

        /* Scrollbar */
        ::-webkit-scrollbar {
            width: 6px;
        }

        ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
        }

        ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.3);
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
            background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.5);
        }

        /* Responsive */
        @media (max-width: 1536px) {
            .app-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr 320px;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 1280px) {
            .app-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            .sidebar, .right-panel {
                display: none;
            }
        }

        /* RTL */
        [dir="rtl"] {
            font-family: 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic', 'Inter', sans-serif;
        }

        [dir="rtl"] .quick-action:hover {
            transform: translateX(-4px);
        }
    </style>
</head>

                    agent: 'DevLinc',

                    subtitle: { en: 'Learning, productivity, wellness, and creative development', ar: 'ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿπŸÑŸÖ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ•ŸÜÿ™ÿßÿ¨Ÿäÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿµÿ≠ÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ŸàŸäÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ®ÿØÿßÿπŸä' },
                    agent: 'GrowthLinc',
                    desc: { en: 'Personal development coach for skills, productivity, health, and creative pursuits.', ar: 'ŸÖÿØÿ±ÿ® ÿ™ÿ∑ŸàŸäÿ± ÿ¥ÿÆÿµŸä ŸÑŸÑŸÖŸáÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ•ŸÜÿ™ÿßÿ¨Ÿäÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿµÿ≠ÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿπŸä ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ®ÿØÿßÿπŸäÿ©' }
                }
            },

            quickActions: {
                healthcare: [
                    { icon: '‚öïÔ∏è', title: 'Clinical Query', desc: 'Medical guidance', prompt: 'I need clinical decision support for a patient case' },
                    { icon: 'üìã', title: 'Claims Analysis', desc: 'Rejection review', prompt: 'Analyze recent claim rejections and provide optimization suggestions' },
                    { icon: 'üî¨', title: 'Diagnostic Help', desc: 'Image analysis', prompt: 'Help me interpret diagnostic imaging results' },
                    { icon: '‚úì', title: 'Compliance Check', desc: 'HIPAA/NPHIES', prompt: 'Review compliance requirements for my healthcare facility' }
                ],
                business: [
                    { icon: 'üìä', title: 'Market Analysis', desc: 'Industry trends', prompt: 'Analyze current market trends and competitive landscape' },
                    { icon: 'üí°', title: 'Strategy Session', desc: 'Growth planning', prompt: 'Help me develop a strategic growth plan for Q2 2026' },
                    { icon: 'üìà', title: 'Financial Model', desc: 'Build projections', prompt: 'Create a 3-year financial projection model' },
                    { icon: 'üéØ', title: 'OKR Planning', desc: 'Set objectives', prompt: 'Help me define quarterly OKRs for my team' }
                ],
                development: [
                    { icon: 'üêõ', title: 'Debug Code', desc: 'Fix errors', prompt: 'Help me debug this code and fix the error' },
                    { icon: 'üèóÔ∏è', title: 'Architecture', desc: 'System design', prompt: 'Design a scalable microservices architecture' },
                    { icon: '‚ö°', title: 'Optimize', desc: 'Performance', prompt: 'Optimize this code for better performance and efficiency' },
                    { icon: 'üìù', title: 'Code Review', desc: 'Best practices', prompt: 'Review my code and suggest improvements' }
                ],
                personal: [
                    { icon: 'üéì', title: 'Learning Path', desc: 'Skill roadmap', prompt: 'Create a learning path for mastering AI and machine learning' },
                    { icon: 'üìö', title: 'Study Plan', desc: 'Organize learning', prompt: 'Help me create an effective study schedule' },
                    { icon: 'üéØ', title: 'Skill Assessment', desc: 'Gap analysis', prompt: 'Analyze my skill gaps for career advancement' },
                    { icon: 'üí™', title: 'Practice', desc: 'Build skills', prompt: 'Give me practice problems to improve my skills' }
                ]
            },

            suggestedPrompts: {
                healthcare: [
                    'Interpret abnormal CBC lab results',
                    'Analyze drug-drug interactions',
                    'Create clinical documentation template',
                    'Review diabetes treatment protocol'
                ],
                business: [
                    'SWOT analysis for market entry',
                    'Competitor benchmarking report',
                    'Business model canvas review',
                    'Pricing strategy optimization'
                ],
                development: [
                    'Refactor this Python function',
                    'Explain OAuth 2.0 implementation',
                    'Design RESTful API endpoints',
                    'Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions'
                ],
                personal: [
                    'Explain quantum computing basics',
                    'Create flashcards for memory retention',
                    'Recommend leadership books',
                    'Spanish conversation practice'
                ]
            },

            init() {
                this.bindEvents();
                this.renderWelcome();
                this.updateUI();
            },

            bindEvents() {
                // Domain switching
                document.querySelectorAll('.domain-card').forEach(card => {
                    card.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                        const domain = e.currentTarget.dataset.domain;
                        this.switchDomain(domain);
                    });
                });

                // Language toggle
                document.querySelectorAll('.lang-btn').forEach(btn => {
                    btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                        this.switchLang(e.target.dataset.lang);
                    });
                });

                // Send message
                const input = document.getElementById('message-input');
                const sendBtn = document.getElementById('send-button');

                input.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
                    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        this.sendMessage();
                    }
                });

                input.addEventListener('input', () => this.autoResize());

                sendBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.sendMessage());
            },

            switchDomain(domain) {
                this.state.domain = domain;

                // Update active card
                document.querySelectorAll('.domain-card').forEach(card => {
                    card.classList.toggle('active', card.dataset.domain === domain);
                });

                this.updateUI();

                const config = this.domains[domain];
                this.addMessage('assistant', 
                    `Switched to **${config.title.en}**. ${config.agent} is ready to assist you.`, 
                    config.agent
                );
            },

            switchLang(lang) {
                this.state.lang = lang;
                document.documentElement.setAttribute('lang', lang);
                document.documentElement.setAttribute('dir', lang === 'ar' ? 'rtl' : 'ltr');

                document.querySelectorAll('.lang-btn').forEach(btn => {
                    btn.classList.toggle('active', btn.dataset.lang === lang);
                });

                this.updateUI();
            },

            updateUI() {
                const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
                const lang = this.state.lang;

                document.getElementById('domain-title').textContent = config.title[lang];
                document.getElementById('domain-subtitle').textContent = config.subtitle[lang];
                document.getElementById('agent-name').textContent = config.agent;
                document.getElementById('agent-desc').textContent = config.desc[lang];

                this.renderQuickActions();
                this.renderPrompts();
            },

            renderQuickActions() {
                const container = document.getElementById('quick-actions-container');
                const actions = this.quickActions[this.state.domain];

                container.innerHTML = actions.map(a => `
                    <div class="quick-action" onclick="APP.useAction('${a.prompt.replace(/'/g, "\\'")}')">
                        <div class="qa-icon">${a.icon}</div>
                        <div class="qa-title">${a.title}</div>
                        <div class="qa-desc">${a.desc}</div>
                    </div>
                `).join('');
            },

            renderPrompts() {
                const container = document.getElementById('prompts-container');
                const prompts = this.suggestedPrompts[this.state.domain];

                container.innerHTML = prompts.map(p => `
                    <div class="prompt-chip" onclick="APP.fillPrompt('${p.replace(/'/g, "\\'")}')">
                        ${p}
                    </div>
                `).join('');
            },

            useAction(prompt) {
                document.getElementById('message-input').value = prompt;
                this.sendMessage();
            },

            fillPrompt(prompt) {
                document.getElementById('message-input').value = prompt;
                document.getElementById('message-input').focus();
            },

            renderWelcome() {
                const msg = `Welcome to **MASTERLINC**, your universal AI intelligence platform. I orchestrate specialized agents across four domains:

**üè• Healthcare & Medical** - Clinical support, claims, diagnostics, compliance
**üìä Business & Operations** - Strategy, finance, marketing, operations
**üíª Development & Tech** - Full-stack coding, architecture, DevOps, AI/ML
**üéØ Personal Growth** - Learning, productivity, wellness, creativity

How can I assist you today?`;

                this.addMessage('assistant', msg, 'MASTERLINC');
            },

            async sendMessage() {
                if (this.state.processing) return;

                const input = document.getElementById('message-input');
                const msg = input.value.trim();
                
                if (!msg) return;

                this.addMessage('user', msg);
                input.value = '';
                this.autoResize();

                this.showTyping();
                this.state.processing = true;

                try {
                    const response = await this.callClaude(msg);
                    this.hideTyping();
                    
                    const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
                    this.addMessage('assistant', response, config.agent);
                } catch (error) {
                    this.hideTyping();
                    this.addMessage('assistant', `‚ö†Ô∏è Error: ${error.message}`, 'System');
                } finally {
                    this.state.processing = false;
                }
            },

            async callClaude(userMessage) {
                const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
                
                const systemPrompt = `You are ${config.agent}, a specialized AI assistant for ${config.title.en}.

${config.desc.en}

Guidelines:
- Provide expert, actionable guidance
- Use domain-specific terminology appropriately
- Be concise but comprehensive
- Include examples when helpful
- Format with markdown for clarity
- If query suits another domain better, mention it

Language: ${this.state.lang === 'en' ? 'English' : 'Arabic'}`;

                try {
                    // AGENT: Call Anthropic API
                    const response = await fetch('https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages', {
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                            'anthropic-version': '2023-06-01'
                            // API key handled by browser extension or proxy
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            model: 'claude-sonnet-4-20250514',
                            max_tokens: 2048,
                            system: systemPrompt,
                            messages: [{
                                role: 'user',
                                content: userMessage
                            }]
                        })
                    });

                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error(`API error: ${response.status}`);
                    }

                    const data = await response.json();
                    
                    if (data.content?.[0]?.text) {
                        return data.content[0].text;
                    }
                    
                    throw new Error('Invalid API response');
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Claude API error:', error);
                    
                    // Intelligent fallback
                    return this.fallbackResponse(userMessage);
                }
            },

            fallbackResponse(userMessage) {
                const config = this.domains[this.state.domain];
                
                return `I'm ${config.agent}, ready to help with "${userMessage}"

**Note**: This is a fallback response. To enable real-time Claude AI:
1. Add your Anthropic API key via browser extension
2. Use a proxy service with API key
3. Deploy with server-side API integration

**${config.agent} specializes in:**
${config.desc.en}

Would you like me to help you get started with any specific task in this domain?`;
            },

            addMessage(type, text, sender = '') {
                const container = document.getElementById('messages-container');
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.className = `message ${type}`;

                const time = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(this.state.lang === 'ar' ? 'ar-SA' : 'en-US', {
                    hour: '2-digit',
                    minute: '2-digit'
                });

                const avatar = type === 'assistant' ? (sender?.substring(0, 2) || 'ML') : 'You';
                const badge = type === 'assistant' && sender ? `<span class="msg-badge">${sender}</span>` : '';

                div.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="msg-avatar ${type}">${avatar}</div>
                    <div class="msg-content">
                        <div class="msg-header">
                            <span class="msg-name">${sender || (type === 'user' ? 'You' : 'Assistant')}</span>
                            ${badge}
                            <span class="msg-time">${time}</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="msg-text">${this.formatText(text)}</div>
                    </div>
                `;

                container.appendChild(div);
                container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
            },

            formatText(text) {
                return text
                    .replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/g, '<strong>$1</strong>')
                    .replace(/\*(.*?)\*/g, '<em>$1</em>')
                    .replace(/`(.*?)`/g, '<code>$1</code>')
                    .replace(/\n/g, '<br>');
            },

            showTyping() {
                const container = document.getElementById('messages-container');
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.id = 'typing-indicator';
                div.className = 'message assistant';
                div.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="msg-avatar assistant">ML</div>
                    <div class="typing">
                        <span class="typing-dot"></span>
                        <span class="typing-dot"></span>
                        <span class="typing-dot"></span>
                    </div>
                `;
                container.appendChild(div);
                container.scrollTop = container.scrollHeight;
            },

            hideTyping() {
                const typing = document.getElementById('typing-indicator');
                typing?.remove();
            },

            autoResize() {
                const textarea = document.getElementById('message-input');
                textarea.style.height = 'auto';
                textarea.style.height = Math.min(textarea.scrollHeight, 200) + 'px';
            }
        };

        // Initialize
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => APP.init());

        // Parallax effect
        document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
            const x = (e.clientX / window.innerWidth - 0.5) * 30;
            const y = (e.clientY / window.innerHeight - 0.5) * 30;
            
            document.querySelectorAll('.gradient-sphere').forEach((sphere, i) => {
                const speed = (i + 1) * 0.3;
                sphere.style.transform = `translate(${x * speed}px, ${y * speed}px)`;
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
